description: Business code identifying how the part is used/managed in inventory; drives stocking, procurement, and prioritization rules.
Human-readable description of the usage category corresponding to the code, guiding stocking, criticality, or assignment decisions.
Indicates the usage category record is retired and should not be assigned to new parts; kept for historical reference.
System-generated unique identifier for the usage category record, used as the primary key and for relational joins.
